plot: A death row inmate survives execution and returns as a supernatural force known as Reaper, wrecking havoc on a hotel which happens to be the meeting place of some very dangerous players and a wily girl who's caught up in the middle of it.
title: Reaper
plot_es: A death row inmate survives execution and returns as a supernatural force known as Reaper, wrecking havoc on a hotel which happens to be the meeting place of some very dangerous players and a wily girl who's caught up in the middle of it.
plot_en: A death row inmate survives execution and returns as a supernatural force known as Reaper, wrecking havoc on a hotel which happens to be the meeting place of some very dangerous players and a wily girl who's caught up in the middle of it.
